meanings.sent1: The multiunit building had many apartments.
meanings.sent2: The multiunit system allowed for different parts to work together.
meanings.sent3: The multiunit puzzle was challenging to put together.
meanings.sent4: Her multiunit approach to problem-solving involved considering various factors at once.
meanings.sent5: The multiunit structure of the toy made it versatile and fun to play with.

meanings.definition: A building containing multiple separate living spaces.
meanings.sent1: The multiunit housed several families under one roof.
meanings.sent2: Living in a multiunit can provide a sense of community.
meanings.sent3: The multiunit was like a small village within the city.
meanings.sent4: The multiunit buzzed with activity as neighbors interacted daily.
meanings.sent5: The multiunit's shared courtyard was a hub of social gatherings.
